ARABIC: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On that Day you will be exposed - no concealed act you did will stay concealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You will then be set before Him, and not one of you will remain unexposed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That will be the Day when you shall be brought forth (before Allah) and no secret of yours shall remain hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day all your secrets will be exposed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On that day all of you will be brought forth, so none among you wishing to hide will be able to hide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That Day shall you be brought to Judgement, not a secret of you will be hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: On that day you shall be exposed to view-- no secret of yours shall remain hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: On that day you shall be exposed, not one secret of yours concealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On that day ye will be exposed; not a secret of you will be hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day you will be brought to judgement and none of your secrets will remain hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The Day whereon ye shall be mustered nothing hidden by you shall be hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That day you will be presented [before your Lord]: none of your secrets will remain hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That Day shall ye be brought to Judgment: not an act of yours that ye hide will be hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That Day shall you be brought to Judgement, not a secret of you will be hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day you shall be exposed, and no secret of yours will remain hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day you will be exposed, and no secret of yours will remain hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:18] On that day you will be exposed, before the Reckoning. No hidden thing of yours, in the way of secrets, will remain hidden (read [feminine person] takhfā or [masculine person] yakhfā).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On that day) which is the Day of Judgement (ye will be exposed) you will stand before your Lord three times: once for reckoning and presenting excuses, once for settling disputes and retaliation and once for the handing over of the scroll of one's deeds and reading them; (not a secret of you will be hidden) none of you will be left out; it is also said this means: no one's secret will be hidden from Allah; it is also said that this means: none of your works will be hidden from Allah.
